meaning_str.bing:
v. 协助；帮助；援助；促进
n. （曲棍球等）助攻；（棒球等）助杀
网络. 辅助；出席；支援

帮助；协助；给予支持；援助；促进；[体育]助攻；辅助；加强；补充
帮助；援助；协助；[体育]助攻；支援；援手；辅助行为

1.en: I attach my contract certificate for your perusal and I wish you can assist me to secure my fund for me. . .
1.cn: 我为您审阅我的合同证书附加，我想你可以帮助我为我，以确保基金…

2.en: Without a docent to assist us, many of us would not be able to really "see" much of what is being exhibited.
2.cn: 若没有导赏员的协助，我们未必能「看见」展品真正的价值。

3.en: We thank you for your politeness in allowing our discourse to take place in the terms that we chose to assist.
3.cn: 我们感谢你的礼貌，允许我们陈述就我们选择去如何协助的角度来谈谈。

0.en: Hey, if I could assist you over there, would you sign up for my badge?
0.cn: 嘿，如果我能帮助你到达那边，你会给我颁发徽章么?

1.en: So you wanna assist an old person. Yeah. Then I'll be a senior wilderness explorer.
1.cn: 你是想要帮助老人家咯。是啊，那我就会成为高级荒野探险家。

2.en: So now we assist our allies, in solving human conflicts. To prevent mankind from bringing harm to itself.
2.cn: 现在我们帮助盟军，解决人类的冲突，防止人类伤害自己。

3.en: Well, that's why you're here, isn't it? To assist with our repairs? Why else would the head of Starfleet personally come to the edge of the Neutral Zone?
3.cn: 我想这就是您来这里的原因，没错吧? 来帮助我们维修？不然为什么联盟的高官会亲自来到中立区的边缘地带?

4.en: Good evening, Your Majesty. Allow me to assist.
4.cn: 晚安，陛下。让我来服侍您。

5.en: He hoped a ride in the grasslands might assist him.
5.cn: 于是去了草原，意欲静心。

6.en: But I've already said publicly I'd assist if he asked.
6.cn: 但我已经公开声明如果他需要我会协助。

7.en: Do you mean assist you? Yeah, whatever. Ok, I'll climb up.
7.cn: 你是说踩着你爬上去吗? 是的，随便了。好吧 我来爬。

8.en: You can't assist an investigation anymore. What? What does that mean?
8.cn: 你不能再参加调查工作了。什么？这什么意思？

9.en: We will use our air power. We will train and equip our partners. We will advise and we will assist.
9.cn: 我们将继续利用空中优势，为盟国提供装备和人员培训，提供情报和咨询建议。

10.en: I spoke with the president, and I said that I'm willing to assist in any way if it would be helpful.
10.cn: 我和总统谈过，我说我愿提供任何协助。

11.en: We don't intercept with Earth at all, but we come close enough to get a gravity assist and adjust course.
11.cn: 我们不被地球捕获，但我们足够靠近，以借助重力调整路线。

12.en: And, before you answer, consider the consequences. If we mess up the supply rendezvous, we die. If we mess up the Earth gravity assist, we die.
12.cn: 在你回答去不去之前，想想后果。 如果我们在对接补给的时候没搞好，我们都得死，如果我们没能好好的借助地心引力，我们也是死。
